SPELL_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer())
SPELL_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end
